typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	triggerTime as string
}
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	wildcardPaths:[('providence-health/input/*' + $triggerTime)]) ~> ParquetCrudInput
ParquetCrudInput sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['output.parquet'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> ParquetCrudOutput
